website_summaries.verdict: A favorite among NARS lovers for good reasons – it offers superior blendability, control, and wear.
pros: Offers the best of both worlds: a creamy texture that's blendable and wear that lasts for up to 12 hours
Pencil is retractable and comes with its own built-in sharpener
Most users praise it for not smearing or transferring
cons: Sharpening to a precise point can be a bit tedious
Some shades have a shimmery finish, which won't appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t real!
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a knock off. I fell in love with Nars larger than life eyeliner because after a whole day of wearing it there were no smudges and it still looked FRESH! After only a 30 minutes to a hour, I have black smudges under my lower lash line and I’m constantly having to reapply!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Lee

customer_reviews.title: defective item
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I have purchased this item at a retail store and it lasted for several months. The liner purchased here lasted about one month, did not draw a solid line, was "crumbly" and broke after a little over a months use.
customer_reviews.author: donna m fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Not real product! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this NARS eyeline (usually purchased from Sephora), so I know exactly what it should be like, and this was definitely not it. The eyeliner case itself came apart after 1 week of using and the back part that popped off looks nothing like the authentic ones I've previously bought.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Winnick

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: This is not real it is not Narrs and they charged me $25 for it and when I went to call back to tell them about it my expiration was already there rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: NARS Long lasting eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I was given the NARS Larger Than Life Long-Wear Eyeliner as a sample from Ulta. I had been using another popular brand but lately found that the tip was not being sharpened like it was supposed to and wanted to try another brand. At first I wasn't sure if the color, Via Veneto, would work because it was black and I was using dark brown, but after trying it, it looked fine. It is long lasting and doesn't smudge, goes on smoothly, and is a few dollars less that my previous brand so I will continue to purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: candidreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, stays and stays.
customer_reviews.text: Want a waterproof, grey eye liner this has super superior stay ability. Works best if you refrigerate it before you use the shapener. It has a tendency to break if it's soft. I use a brush for application or it can break. I even have some left after using make up remover! I like it, not so harsh as black on light hair persons.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A JOKE
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to purchase this item through Amazon. My friend/coworker had mentioned to me how popular ladies used this product. I purchased it in August 2018. It's not the money at this point, it's just never has work as it should. I went to sharpen the pencil and the black tip fell off. I used the top end to fine sharpen it and only got wood scratching my lids. I set it aside and decided to use a different pencil that did not need sharpening. Today, I gave it another try. Yeah, It's a piece of junk! Just threw in the trash! I'm too old to play with make up.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Lozano

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MINT GREEN EYELINER
customer_reviews.text: I truly love the NARS Barrow Street eyeliner. I hope NARS isn't discontinuing this product because, I found a mint green eyeliner that I love. I have gotten so many compliments on this eyeliner and it's a great mint green color.
customer_reviews.author: Tippin Fan

customer_reviews.title: Wear this every day
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye liner. Black eye liner doesn't look good on me, I feel like it makes me look like a witch. But this brown is perrrrect. It makes my eyes look awesome and NARS is top quality so this is my go-to now. I wear it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality-dried up
customer_reviews.text: Pencil is so dried, cannot even get any line or color from.
customer_reviews.author: FJandPebbles

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for your water line
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this eyeliner because it said it works great as a water line eyeliner. Nope. It started coming off before I even finished putting my make up on. So disappointed!!☹️
customer_reviews.author: Michele Larson

customer_reviews.title: pencil point broke right away
customer_reviews.text: The pencil point broke when i used the sharpener that goes with the pencil. What i liked was that the pencil seem to last longer than other eye liners. This is only from one wearing so i'm not sure if this is a good review
customer_reviews.author: joanne cuomo

customer_reviews.title: Not too great for waterline
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the waterline. It comes right off my waterline within 30 minutes. Other than that, it's a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that works on my waterline!
customer_reviews.text: I use liner on my waterline, and I've been searching for something with any type of wear. This is the best I've tried. It stays on for hours - not the whole day - but it's easy to use and much longer lasting than products that are twice the price. I will continue to order this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Superior to all others
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I have ever used. I have tossed dozens of different brands of eyeliner pencils in the trash, as their products disappeared or rolled off my face, some within an hour of having been applied, despite their claims otherwise. This eyeliner lasts at least 4+ hours in hot weather, and 6+ hours in cool weather. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: alaskafan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend your money and time
customer_reviews.text: This product is not authentic . It’s fake . The pencil was very hard and it didn’t apply at all. DO NOT BUY THIS . IT IS FAKE FAKE FAKE. Don’t waste your money . I know I did .
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sarvis

customer_reviews.title: Stays put all day!
customer_reviews.text: Love this liner stays put on the water line, no raccoon eyes with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: only ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok until you need to use sharpener, then forget it. You have to deal with never having good point again, splinters etc. Needs self sharpening feature
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Not a full size product.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive a FULL size product. Very disappointed as this was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality or old product.
customer_reviews.text: The pencil just gets chewed up when sharpened with a NARS sharpener. Sharp edges in the wood. I even purchased a brand new sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good Liner
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Nars pencil liner. Really like this color and lasts a long time. Easy to make a narrow line. Only complaint as it gets older it gets hard. Harder to get a good line then. For the price it should really stay softer longer.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Exactly what I wanted goes on smoothly and stays well and is easy to wash off.. Same price as in the stores though.
customer_reviews.author: DonaQuijote

customer_reviews.title: Completely Love
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a type of Prestige drugstore eyeliner that has become increasingly difficult to find where I live. This eyeliner's very similar but higher quality, and has self-sharpening tip that you spin to push more pencil out. Worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: mellabee

customer_reviews.title: I really like this liner.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading that lining your water line can give a more lively look, which I think we could all need a little help with that sometimes. I didn't want a white, because I don't feel that would look as natural. It is long lasting and very smooth to apply. Will be buying in other colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: I love mine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! I didn't have any issues with mine drying out at all, and it stays on all day with no problem. Also, doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes like other waterproofs do. I read these reviews before I ordered mine, and was afraid of it drying out - but I make sure to keep the cap on really tight any time i'm not using it. I've had it for several weeks now and it still is as good as new. When this one is gone, I will definitely get another one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Have used eyeliner four times. Now I’m unable to roll out the tip. I have used Nars eyeliner in the past and never had this issue. This is definitely not value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner,white doesnt look good on me and i wanted something more flattering and subtle this eyeliner is very good stays all day and doesnt make me tear up,which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: ccgirl

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner I have come across yet
customer_reviews.text: It can make it through the work day, need I say more, it can stand the test of time. If your eyes lids get oily through the day a quick wipe will fix it and you will still have product on.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne 321

customer_reviews.title: My best friend! It's water proof and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to eye liner! My best friend! It's water proof and long lasting. No smear!
customer_reviews.author: Ka Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter for Xmas she loves it
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Stays on as applies
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye pencil I have found yet! Easy to apply and it really stays put.
customer_reviews.author: mjade

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day and does not smudge
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It stays on all day and does not smudge. Great for tightlining as well! I always make sure I have this and will not purchase any other kind now!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ann Lay

customer_reviews.title: Best Seller! I was desperate but shipping was free and super fast..YAY!!
customer_reviews.text: Under eye liner.....easy to use, love the soft and smoky finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Check Size!
customer_reviews.text: Beware that this is a reduced size product. Still a great product, just not the normal .02oz size!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.

customer_reviews.title: Photo is misleading
customer_reviews.text: The photo is not the same as the product and what was delivered is half of the size
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Good for waterline use
customer_reviews.text: I initially got this for use in some gyaru looks, specifically ganguro, for the waterline. I still have to reapply once in a while when I use this one my waterline but it lasts a lot longer than any other liner I've tried. It's also a really pure white. I've used other brands on my waterline that last longer but for whatever reason don't offer this shade. The creamy consistency glides on pretty effortlessly and it doesn't take layers and layers of coats to get the right amount of color. I really like it and wouldn't hesitate to purchase this again when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: lorio

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner...but use it quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Never had eyeliner that went on this easily and smoothly. Lasts all day without significant smudging like most cheaper eyeliners. Have been using this product over two months now. Very satisfied with it and definitely won't be changing brands for a while. Update: Took 3.5 months for it to dry out. A bit disappointed but still was able to get 80% out of it. Even kept the top on after every use. Maybe its just the dry AZ air? Still purchased another because it just goes on so fast.
customer_reviews.author: shopping junkie

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is the beat eyeliner stays on all day and doesn’t smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I've used. It goes on smooth and stays on. It can smear a bit at the corners, but if you don't over-line the outside or inside corners of your eye, there should be absolutely no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Washed out color
customer_reviews.text: Not as dark as needed. Took a chance and lost this time. Look at the item at a cosmetics counter before buying to make sure it's the desired color.
customer_reviews.author: prb in California

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. It doesnt go on as thick as most eyeliners do.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Beard

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed too many times, I'm breaking up with NARS
customer_reviews.text: I am a NARS eyeliner fan when the stick is new. Once it is a couple weeks old the eyeliner tends to dry out and pulls and tugs during application, sharpening only helps marginally. It is very expensive eyeliner, I expect a lot more out of it. This has happened to me more than once and I have spoken to a NARS rep about it. Unfortunately, I think I will go back to MAC eyeliner. It breaks my heart to throw out an stick of expensive eyeliner with more than half left.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Wears so well and doesn’t smudge. Wish it wasn’t discontinued
customer_reviews.author: Justine Branson

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: This was a scam and a rip off! I love this liner but I received a sample not a “mini”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pulling it all together!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful - just the right color - have hazel eyes and Madison Avenue pulls it all together wearing gray these days!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Buxbaum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner, worth the price...will buy again..great packaging quick shipping..thanks
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Longest lasting eyeliner I've ever used! Prefect for waterline and tight lining, doesn't run at all!
customer_reviews.author: S. Farias

customer_reviews.title: Nars eyeliner pencil
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first week and you can't sharpen it .. It's hollow in side
customer_reviews.author: martha Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Life Long-Wear Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This product was expensive and I thought it would be special. However, I had better results with other eye liners ie: Maybellene etc.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love how dark and smooth the eyeliner is. It doesn't smudge all over my eye and to top it it has a sharpner attached to it. My favorite eyeliner ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nikfar

customer_reviews.title: Very natural look
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner - I had never worn a liner above my lower lashes, but now I won't wear makeup without this! The color is perfect for my pale skin tone - it does not look obvious, it just makes me look more awake -helpful during allergy season!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Not a nice color at all
customer_reviews.text: I have the rue color and I read about in a magazine about making my eyes look bigger, well it looks like I'm wearing awful concealer around my eyes or in the corner of my eyes. I would not buy this colors
customer_reviews.author: Therearemiracles

customer_reviews.title: Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this color does not go on smooth like the via veneto that I ordered. Unless I want to make my lids red by rubbing so hard to even get the littlest bit on my lid, this is basically un-usable. So disappointing since I love my 4 other shades of NARS liner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the pencil, but it came broken.
customer_reviews.text: I adore nars and I love Amazon... so I did what I thought was a good idea. The pencil came broken, but I kept it because I opened it and didn't feel right sending back open make-up(kinda gross). I will just not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Midge Thibault

customer_reviews.title: I FINALLY got what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few days and I'm pretty sure I will never buy any other eyeliner ever again. It works quickly, glides easily, works on waterline, doesn't run into tiny cracks around the eye during even hit and humid days. I have never bought NARS cosmetics because of the cost. I'm pretty sure it's all I will be buying from now on. I've been looking for a good eyeliner for over a year, especially for the waterline, that stays, doesn't flake, and goes on smooth. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gotfried

customer_reviews.title: Smooth liner but doesn't stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love how it smooths on and when I first open product, but it's impossible to sharpen when it gets dull, the liner doesn't appear to have a built in sharpener so for what I paid for it I am not extremely satisfied, I can get several others of different brands for same cost that have a built in sharpener or will sharpen by me.
customer_reviews.author: Starlite3

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is a little lighter than it appears in the picture. It arrived in the original box and came with a little sharpener on the end. I was glad there was a little instruction sheet showing exactly how to use the sharpener. The eyeliner glides on nicely and stays on for the better part of the day. I love Nars so as always I am happy with it, especially for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! It goes on smooth and doesn't drag on my wrinkled eyelids! I will try other colors soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: BEST!
customer_reviews.text: BEST eyeliner I've ever used! The pigmentation is great! Its easy to apply and there is no need to sharpen since it is retractable. Its very difficult to find an eyeliner that lasts all day. I always have to reapply eyeliner throughout the day. But since I started using this NARS eyeliner I find myself only having to apply it twice a day during warmer days. When its colder out I only need to apply it once. I will totally be buying the full size :)
customer_reviews.author: ABCD

customer_reviews.title: Good eye liner!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't irritate my eyes like so many of them do. Easy enough to apply. KP
customer_reviews.author: kimico

customer_reviews.title: Great NARS Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The blue color was hard to find at a reasonable price. It came quickly. I use it over my shadow and on my upper and lower lids. It applies easily and lasts all day. Fun color
customer_reviews.author: Roanimal

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I ever wear. Stays put and is nice and dark. Was nice to find it cheaper on amazon than in Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Samrose2

customer_reviews.title: I love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! Very dark, applys on nicely. I started using it because they send me a small one with a eyeshadow set I order. I tried it n I fell I love with it. Honestly say it's better then MAC black pencil, and it's almost like MarcJacobs black pencil, but cheaper 💰
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this brand and I love it! I'm not using any other kind any time soon. I line my lower waterline all the time and with other liners I always have to reapply many times throughout the day. With this liner I don't have to! It also glides on so smooth and easy. Highly recommend this liner!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best eyeliner out there. Great for people who live an athletic lifestyle, because it stays intact even when you sweat! Bought it in grey and black. The grey is beautiful because it has this cooling tint to it, almost looks like its brightening your eye. The black is best for evening for a controlled smokey eye.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anne Yun

customer_reviews.title: The perfect black liner
customer_reviews.text: This black pencil does not budge. If you, like me, love a pencil look vs. liquid liner look, but fear smudges by 10am - then this is for you. I have had mine for a couple months and it is not dry in the least. All this said, you have to work to get this off. I use good old Vaseline, which I don't mind as it conditions my lashes and adds moisture to the eye area. My only regret is that the brown is coppery vs. a rich coffee brown or I would buy that too.
customer_reviews.author: Koukla

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner. I've been through many many brands and willing to spend up to $30 on a pencil. I have learned that the best, do not smudge, stay all day (ALL day), are wicked black, and last longer then the cheapies. I wear eyeliner every single day so it might not last me as long as the next person but this is the best. Trust me, I've tried a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Godino

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this looking for an eyeliner to use on my waterline without it smudging in the corners after a few hours. This eyeliner goes on smooth and easily but still runs in the corners. I like it for the ease of use but isn't as long-wear as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyr0512

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Rue Bonaparte to line my lower waterline with, but it didn't work out. Didn't stay on at all, and kind of got a weird crinkly texture if I put on even a smidge more than the faintest, thinnest layer. It probably isn't half so bad if you only use it on your eyelids, though.
customer_reviews.author: Yuka Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for me. Needs waterproof make-up remover to get off.
customer_reviews.author: c west

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have discovered NARS
customer_reviews.text: NARS is fabulous. I have very small eyes and normally all eye liners leave raccoon eyes on me. This is the only one that does not. Very vibrant colors, goes on easily and lasts all day without smudging!
customer_reviews.author: misto1211

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the product I did expect more, it is NARS after all. After a couple of hours I looked a bit raccoonie.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: But it is a great eye liner
customer_reviews.text: This is a really really small eyeliner. A lot smaller than the ones you'd pick up in Sephora, and the price just isn't fair for what you actually get. But it is a great eye liner, and my wife swears by it.
customer_reviews.author: Heuberger

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $20
customer_reviews.text: If this were cheaper I would still only give it at most a 3 start rating. It doesn't stay on the water line very long at all and personally I don't find the nude/flesh color to look any better than a white eyeliner to brighten the eyes. I actually prefer the look of my inexpensive drugstore white Prestige eyeliner over this and it stays much longer on the waterline too.
customer_reviews.author: Bellabell

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived on time. I like the color and the ease of using. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawkMom

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is not really white, just a nice subtle pop of neutral that helps with the illusion of larger eyes. I have had it for a few months and still works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Beegz wife

customer_reviews.title: Black eyeliner lovers
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying this eyeliner again :) Goes on smooth, I do not need to re-apply later on in the day and my days are long.
customer_reviews.author: V Ann

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day and the nude tone looks more ...
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day and the nude tone looks more natural than the white pencil, especially if you're tan
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: last long and easy to use. you dont need a sharpener so thats a plus. its like using the gel eyeliner without having to use the brush to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: ella

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is soft and goes on easily. It is also the perfect shade of black, very dark which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile
customer_reviews.text: Nice color with good staying power, but the liner "lead" inside the pencil shatters very easily. Have purchased twice and this happened both times.
customer_reviews.author: Simka

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but I wish it would last a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn GG

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent and stays all day!! I buy it because i saw videos in youtube like missglamorazzi, she used and i love it
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was thinking it was
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading. It looks like a nice light blue, which would be good for hazel-brown eyes, but it is almost BLACK! Not quite what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: My search is over.... yes, there is a perfect eyeliner, & this is it. Perfection. I am a new NARS fan.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Green eye-liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this green eye-liner and really has vibrant color and goes well with my skin tone. I like the sharpener on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharhonda

customer_reviews.title: Blue eye-liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this blue eye-liner and really has vibrant color and goes well with my skin tone. I like the sharpener on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharhonda

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The pencil arrived dry and not usable. I wouldn't dare applying it anywhere near my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Looks bizarre up close
customer_reviews.text: Might look good in pictures or from a distance, but I wouldn't know because I've removed it every time I've tried it out. Looks very unnatural.
customer_reviews.author: modine9192

customer_reviews.title: Nars Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Makes my eyes seem more awake. Even when I do not get enough sleep. Everyone should try this out ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M. Brailo

customer_reviews.title: Seems awesome! A bit confused on how to sharpen
customer_reviews.text: Seems awesome! A bit confused on how to sharpen. Where is the built in sharpener?
customer_reviews.author: Tori p

customer_reviews.title: NARS Larger than Life Long-Wear Eyeliner, Abbey Road
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this eyeliner and prefer my almay Jade one to it. The color looks garish on me and it smears.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jordon

product_meta.title: Nars Larger Than Life Long-wear Eyeliner - Bourbon Street By Nars for Women - 0.02 Oz Eyeliner, 0.02 Oz
product_meta.description: Color:PurpleTake applying makeup and liner to the next level with this long-wear eyeliner. It is designed with a retractable applicator, and built-in sharpener, This liner has a rich, creamy color that glides on smoothly with a completely budge-proof finish.
feature_bullets: This lightweight, creamy moisturizer invisibly covers redness
Unevenness as it infuses skin with refreshing, sustained hydration
Skin looks like skin, but softer, smoother, and naturally radiant

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
